```
# SquareSpiral1.py - Draws a square spiral
import turtle
t = turtle.Pen()
for x in range(100):
    t.forward(x)
    t.left(90)
```

```
for x in range(100):
    t.forward(x)
    t.left(90)
```

```
import turtle
t = turtle.Pen()
for x in range(100):
    t.forward(x)
    t.left(91)
```

```
import turtle
t = turtle.Pen()
for x in range(100):
    t.circle(x)
    t.left(91)
```

```
import turtle
t = turtle.Pen()
t.pencolor("red")
for x in range(100):
    t.forward(x)
    t.left(91)
```

```
import turtle
t = turtle.Pen()
colors = ["red", "yellow", "blue", "green"]
for x in range(100):
    t.pencolor(colors[x%4])
    t.forward(x)
    t.left(91)
```

```
import turtle
t = turtle.Pen()
turtle.bgcolor("black")
colors = ["red", "yellow", "blue", "green"]
for x in range(100):
    t.pencolor(colors[x%4])
    t.circle(x)
    t.left(91)
```

```
import turtle
t = turtle.Pen()
turtle.bgcolor("black")
# You can choose between 2 and 6 sides for some cool shapes!
sides = 6
colors = ["red", "yellow", "blue", "orange", "green", "purple"]
for x in range(360):
    t.pencolor(colors[x%sides])
    t.forward(x * 3/sides + x)
    t.left(360/sides + 1)
    t.width(x*sides/200)
```

```
sides = eval(input("Enter a number of sides between 2 and 6: "))
```
